How to learn programming, and not just Python

Apr 13, 2017 MoscowPythonJunior Moscow, Russia Edit this page

A lot of newcomers try to learn just practical skills without building a complete knowledge system.

This motivational talk tries to push junior developers to invest time and effort into self-education.

And warns them, that this is a very long (never-ending) process.
